DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select IC.CreateFiscalDate as [Issue Date], IC.InstallmentContractCode as [Contract Code], UsrLogin.UserName as [Account Username], UsrEmail.UserName as [Account Username (email)], A.DisplayName as [Account Name], Sum(xAll.InstallmentAmount) as [Due Amount], Sum(case when xAll.ScheduledDate>:@TargetDate then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Current Amount], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 1 and 30) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 01-30 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 31 and 60) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 31-60 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 61 and 90) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 61-90 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 91 and 120) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 91-120 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 121 and 150) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 121-150 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) between 151 and 180) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by 151-180 days], Sum(case when (DateDiff(day, xAll.ScheduledDate, :@TargetDate) > 180) then xAll.InstallmentAmount else 0 end) as [Overdue by >180 days] from tbInstallmentContractDetail xFil left join tbInstallmentContractDetail xAll on xAll.InstallmentContractId=xFil.InstallmentContractId and (xAll.SettleDate is null or xAll.SettleDate>:@TargetDate) left join tbInstallmentContract IC on IC.InstallmentContractId=xFil.InstallmentContractId left join tbAccount A on A.AccountId=IC.AccountId left join tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on UsrLogin.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrLogin.LoginAliasType=0 left join tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on UsrEmail.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1 where xFil.ScheduledDate<:@TargetDate and (xFil.SettleDate is null or xFil.SettleDate>:@TargetDate) group by IC.CreateFiscalDate, IC.InstallmentContractId, IC.InstallmentContractCode, A.DisplayName, UsrLogin.UserName, UsrEmail.UserName order by IC.CreateFiscalDate, A.DisplayName, IC.InstallmentContractCode

RichDescItem.Description:
Installment contract aging


Abstract

“Installment Contract Aging” generates a report of the as of installment contract aging as of a selected date

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
  • [As Of] - Select a date from the calendar
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.​​​​​​​
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] - Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [As Of] - Selected Date

Contents (by Colums)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Issue Date] - Contract Issuing Date
  • [Contract Code] - Contract Code
  • [Account Username] - Account Username.
  • [Account Username (email)] - User Login Mail address
  • [Account Name] - Account User Name. Display format: “Last Name, First Name”.
  • [Due Amount] - Total Overdue Amount per Contract, in local currency
  • [Current Amount] - Total Paid Amount as-of-today in local currency
  • [Overdue by 01-30 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 1 and Day 30 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by 31-60 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 31 and Day 60 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by 61-90 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 61 and Day 90 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by 91-120 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 91 and Day 120 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by 121-150 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 121 and Day 150 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by 151-180 Days] - Total Paid Amount within Day 151 and Day 180 day in local currency
  • [Overdue by >180] - Total Paid Amount over Day 180
